exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> R g : R -> V f' : R -> R g' : R -> V a, b : R l : V H : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> is_derive f t (f' t) H0 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> is_derive g t (g' t) H1 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> continuous f' t H2 : forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> continuous g' t H3 : is_RInt (fun t : R => scal (f' t) (g t)) a b l Unable to unify "RInt ?M2365 ?M2367 ?M2368 = RInt ?M2366 ?M2367 ?M2368" with "forall P : V -> Prop, locally (minus (minus (scal (f b) (g b)) (scal (f a) (g a))) l) P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum (fun t : R => scal (f t) (g' t)) ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) P".
The LHS of Rmult_comm (_ * _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. apply RInt_ext. - intros. unfold scal. rewrite Rmult_comm. reflexivity. - apply is_RInt_swap in H3. apply is_RInt_derive with (f := f) (df := f') in H0. apply is_RInt_derive with (f := g) (df := g') in H1. apply is_RInt_comp in H3. rewrite <- H3. rewrite RInt_comp. rewrite RInt_comp. rewrite <- H0. rewrite <- H1. unfold minus. field.
